news.news: Paul chipped in 18 points (7-13 FG, 2-6 3Pt, 2-2 FT), six rebounds and nine assists across 33 minutes during Monday's 114-110 loss to Chicago.
news.analysis: It was Paul's best scoring effort since he dropped 19 on the Jazz back on Halloween. The future Hall of Famer has scored in single digits in five straight games prior to Monday, and his main fantasy value comes from his still-strong distribution skills. In 17 games since the beginning of December,  Paul has recorded at least eight assists 13 times, averaging 8.1 points, 8.6 assists, 5.1 boards, 1.4 steals and 1.4 threes over that stretch.

news.headline: Hands out 14 assists Sunday
news.news: Paul racked up seven points (3-11 FG, 1-6 3Pt), eight rebounds and 11 assists in 31 minutes during Friday's 113-110 win over Denver.

news.headline: Season-high four pilfers in win
news.news: Paul logged six points (0-6 FG, 0-4 3Pt, 6-6 FT), five rebounds, 14 assists and four steals over 35 minutes during Sunday's 112-110 loss to Minnesota.

news.headline: Held scoreless in loss
news.news: Paul closed with 12 points (4-4 FG, 3-3 3Pt, 1-1 FT), seven rebounds, eight assists, one block and four steals across 32 minutes during Thursday's 133-126 overtime win over the Hawks.

news.headline: Reaches No. 2 in all-time assists
news.news: Paul logged zero points (0-5 FG, 0-3 3Pt), four rebounds, nine assists and two steals in 30 minutes during Sunday's 106-92 loss to the Timberwolves.

news.news: Paul notched six points (2-7 FG, 2-6 3Pt), seven rebounds, 10 assists and two steals across 31 minutes during Sunday's 121-116 victory over the Pelicans.
